name: The 3rd Int’l Congress on Psychiatry
content: The 3rd Int’l Congress on Psychiatry (CP 2023) will be held during June 2-4, 2023, in Chengdu, China. The aim of CP is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Mental Health, Neuroscience Nursing and Neurosurgery, Stress, Anxiety and Depression, Self-harm and Suicide Prevention. CP 2023 will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Psychiatry.
